name: thebrain2-testing
description: Wrapper for all-thing TheBrain, mostly for testing purposes

scripts.test: npm run cypressTestCI && npm run enzymeTest
scripts.cleanAll: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf mobileClient/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules && rm -rf shared/node_modules
scripts.buildAll: npm install && pushd client && npm install && pushd ../mobileClient && npm install && pushd ../server && npm install && pushd ../shared && npm install
scripts.testAll: ENZYME=true BABEL_ENV=test NODE_ENV=TESTING jest --projects testing/mobile testing/web server
scripts.makeStandardHappy: pushd mobileClient; npm run standardFix ; pushd ../server npm run standardFix ; pushd ../client; npm run standardFix

author: The Brain Software House
